phases.name: Phase 1: Codebase Consolidation & Cleanup
phases.description: Relocate all feature-specific code into the `src/features` directory, remove duplicates, and clean up unused files.

tasks.description: Move feature-specific services, types, and utils to their respective feature directories.
Prune unused files from global folders (`components`, `hooks`, `contexts`, etc.).

phases.name: Phase 2: UI/UX Enhancement & Centralization
phases.description: Improve UI consistency, centralize shared logic, and enhance user experience across the app.

phases.name: Phase 3: Performance & Scalability Boost
phases.description: Optimize application performance, and improve codebase scalability for future features.
